GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: amba-clcd: Fix refcount leak bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit a88ab277cca99aeb9a3b2b7db358f1a6dd528b0c, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit d10715be03bd8bad59ddc50236cb140c3bd73c7b. For more details please see the references link.
